title: How is the Byju’s course for class 9 and 10? - Quora

response.answer_text: Although I have not purchased any byju's course but I have seen some demo videos of it which was greatly explained with very good animation. The videos in itself explains very much with crystal clear concept so you can choose it if you want By the way I have started new channel on YouTube for class 9 & 10 science videos for free you can see my videos here
